p:
SARS-CoV-2 is a spherical, enveloped, positive-sense, single-stranded RNA coronavirus, with a characteristic crown-like appearance produced by the peplomers of the spike (S) glycoprotein radiating from the virus lipid envelope when observed under an electron microscope.
10 Its genome contains ~29.8 kb nucleotides, annotated to possess 12 or 14 open reading frames (ORFs), and encodes 9,860 amino acids and 27 proteins (such as 3a, 3b, p6, 7a, 7b, 8b, 9b, and orf14).
